text.*:
Georg Kraus
Georg Kraus at the European Change Forum, 2015
Born (1965-07-30)30 July 1965
Friedrichshafen, Baden-Württemberg, Germany
Residence Bruchsal
Nationality German
Alma mater Karlsruhe Institute of Technology[1]
Occupation management consultant, writer
Years active 1987 – present time
Notable work Projektmanagement mit System:Organisation, Methoden, Steuerung (1995), Handbuch Change-Management (2004)
Title
  • Honorary professor at Clausthal University of Technology,
  • Founder of Dr. Kraus & Partner[2]
Website www.kraus-und-partner.de

Georg Kraus (born July 30, 1965) is a German management consultant and writer;[3][4][5] ,[6] [7] the founder of the Dr. Kraus & Partner consulting company.[2]

Contents

  • 1 Education
  • 2 Career
  • 3 Selected publications
    • 3.1 Books
    • 3.2 Articles
  • 4 References
  • 5 External links

Education[edit]

Kraus received a bachelor's degree at Lycée Kléber at Strasbourg and continued his education at the Karlsruhe Institute of Technology, earning a Doctor of Science degree in 1995.[1] He started his business career in 1987 working for Daimler AG as an internal strategy and project management consultant[6][8] (his doctorate thesis was about employee job satisfaction in the automotive industry).[1] The same year he founded the Dr. Kraus & Partner consulting company.[citation needed]

Career[edit]

Kraus started his academic career in 1994, becoming a lecturer at the Karlsruhe Institute of Technology[5] where he taught a change management course.[9] In 1995, together with Reinhold Westermann, he published a project management textbook named Projektmanagement mit System that has been reprinted 5 times.[10][11] In 2004, together with Christel Becker-Kolle and Thomas Fischer, he co-authored a handbook on change management.[12][13][14]

Kraus also taught at IAE Aix-en-Provence (since 2004),[5] the Clausthal University of Technology (since 2005)[5] and the St. Galler Business School (since 2007).[5][15] In 2015 he was appointed honorary professor at the Faculty of Energy and Economics at Clausthal University of Technology.[5] While working at IAE Aix-en-Provence he initiated the European Change Forum (held annually since 2012).[16][17]

Kraus supports low-income entrepreneurs and students through the Kiva micro loans website[18] and serves as a member of the board of trustees of Heinrich Pesch Foundation.[19]

Selected publications[edit]

Books[edit]

  • Kraus, Georg; Westermann, Reinhold (1995). Projektmanagement mit System [Project management with system] (in German). Gabler Verlag. doi:10.1007/978-3-322-84144-5. ISBN 978-3-322-84144-5. 
  • Kraus, Georg (January 1, 1996). Einfluß des angewandten Projektmanagements auf die Arbeitszufriedenheit der in einer Projektorganisation integrierten Mitarbeiter [Influence of the applied project management on the job satisfaction of the employees integrated in a project organization] (in German). Peter Lang Verlag. ISBN 978-3-631-49262-8. 
  • Kraus, Georg (2002). Mit Projektmanagement zum Erfolg: ein kleines Handbuch für Berater [With project management to success: a small manual for consultants] (in German). RKW Verlag. ISBN 978-3-89644-177-5. 
  • Kraus, Georg; Becker-Kolle, Christel; Fischer, Thomas (2004). Handbuch Change-Management [Handbook on Change Management] (in German). Cornelsen. ISBN 978-3-589-23651-0. 
  • Kraus, Georg; Becker-Kolle, Christel (2004). Führen in Krisenzeiten: Managementfehler vermeiden, schnell und entschieden handeln [Lead in times of crisis: avoid management mistakes, act quickly and decisively] (in German). Gabler. ISBN 978-3-409-12448-5. 
  • Kraus, Georg (2005). Managementbegriffe [Management terms] (in German). Haufe. ISBN 978-3-448-06545-9. 
  • Kraus, Georg; Einecker, Berndt; Franke, Michael (2006). Wirtschaftsjargon und Akronyme: Kommunikation in der Post-New-Economy [Economic jargon and acronyms: communication in the post-new economy] (in German). K-Verlag. ISBN 978-3-00-019536-5. 
  • Nöllke, Matthias; Zielke, Christian; Kraus, Georg (2015). Praxiswissen Management [Practical Knowledge Management] (in German). Haufe Verlag. ISBN 978-3-648-07014-7. 

Articles[edit]

  • Kraus, Georg (2011). "Die "7 Todsünden" des Managements" [The "7 deadly sins" of the management]. Industrial Engineering (in German). 11 (3): 38–39. ISSN 1866-2269. 
  • Kraus, Georg (2011). "Der Kampf um das neue Leitbild" [The fight for the new mission statement]. Die Bank (in German) (12): 8–11. ISSN 0342-3182. 
  • Kraus, Georg (2015). "Innovationen - und die Angst vor dem Scheitern" [Innovations - and the fear of failure]. Wissens Management (in German). April/Mai 2015 (3): 34–35. ISSN 1438-4426. 
  • Kraus, Georg (2016). "Innovationskraft und -geschwindigkeit erhöhen" [Increase innovation and speed]. Technologie & Management (in German). 65 (1): 16–19. ISSN 0932-2558. 
  • Kraus, Georg (2017). "Veränderung nervt! Oder: Stabilität ist eine Illusion" [Change annoys! Or: stability is an illusion]. Technologie & Management (in German). 66 (1). ISSN 0932-2558.
